vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14;
son of: Jahdo (H3163);
father of: Michael (H4317I)
§ Jeshishai = "my old one"
a Gadite from Gilead
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jahdó; tribu de Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶示篩 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我舊有的"
迦得人基列的子孫 (代上5:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶示筛 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我旧有的"
迦得人基列的子孙 (代上5:14)
